title: BBC Local Live: Derbyshire on Wednesday 22 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: police name 14-year-old boy killed in scooter crash .
derby 's market hall to stay closed due to expected storm .
video appeal after woman attacked in city centre .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: today 's local live updates have now finished .
we 'll be back on thursday at 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : wind and rain expected
text: tonightit 'll be cloudy with wind increasing overnight .
heavy and persistent rain is expected during the night and through the early hours .
lows of 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: your enjoying the breeze
text: heanor tog writes : `` to say the weather was supposed to be wet and windy , we 've only had the wind but with some sunny spells .
here is some highland cattle enjoying the breeze at shipley country park . ''
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: town centre attack leaves man with fractured skull
text: a 49-year-old man suffered a fractured skull when he was knocked unconscious by a teenager in ilkeston market place , police have said .
the assault happened after the man was confronted by a group of young people at about 18:40 on 13 february .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : midfielder on brewers blank
text: here 's jacob butterfield reflecting on derby county 's forlorn search for a winner against burton albion at pride park stadium last night .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a final round-up of our top stories :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: market hall to shut due to storm
text: derby 's market hall will be closed tomorrow over fears high winds could put people 's safety at risk .
the council is carrying out repair work to windows - and the frames around them - high up in the hall and says it is n't prepared to take any risks in extreme weather conditions .
author: Andrew Strachan
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: listen : mcclaren on brewers stalemate
text: here 's our full interview with steve mcclaren after the rams failed to find the net against burton albion last night .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: watch : video appeal after woman assaulted
text: this man is wanted by police after a woman was attacked in derby city centre .
detectives said the woman was assaulted near st werburgh 's church in friar gate in the early hours of 7 january .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tributes to scooter death boy
text: here 's a little more on the 14-year-old boy killed in a scooter crash in south normanton on sunday being named as connor revill .
the family of the tibshelf community school pupil described him as being `` loved by everyone '' .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: villa park next for rams
text: here 's who the rams will be facing in the coming weeks .
full fixture list here .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: have rams blown play-off chance ?
text: last night 's 0-0 stalemate against burton has left derby county 10 points adrift of the play-off places with 13 games left this season .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your views : remembering colin bloomfield
text: some lovely comments on our facebook page on what would have been colin bloomfield 's 35th birthday .
toni sharley posted : `` we all miss this lovely young man .
happy birthday colin . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: teen tennis star died of natural causes
text: the family of a talented tennis player who collapsed and died suddenly while taking his dogs for a walk has spoken of its anguish and the `` hole left in their lives '' after a coroner 's report confirmed the teenager died of natural causes .
author: Burton Mail

documents.title: watch : when will storm doris hit us ?
text: if you 're worried about storm doris , bbc weather 's john hammond has a pretty comprehensive round-up of where it 's going to be most severe and when
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new boss for brewers ' rivals
text: an interesting development for burton albion fans - fellow relegation battlers blackburn rovers have just appointed tony mowbray as their new manager .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a reminder of our top stories right now :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: van vandal sought by police
text: police are hunting a young man with blonde hair who smashed a camper van 's front window by throwing a rock at it .
it happened in burlington road in buxton on 31 january .
call 101 if you can help .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : brailsford rainbow
text: did you see a rainbow over derbyshire yesterday ?
anne sent us this photo from brailsford .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: this afternoon 's weather
text: a mixed bag really some cloud around , a couple of light showers ( in southern parts of the east midlands ) and also a few brighter spells .
highs of 11c ( 52f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: councillor 'furious ' about park vandalism
text: the west park vandalism spree has left mike wallis , the council 's lead member for culture and leisure , fuming .
he said : `` to say we are absolutely furious at this latest vandalism would be an understatement .

`` in fact it is very difficult to find words that adequately describe our anger and frustration at the mindless idiots who have caused this damage which is costing us - and our council tax payers - money . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'mindless ' park vandalism spree to cost council £ 3,000
text: vandals snapped a lamp-post in half at long eaton 's west park at the weekend .
the council said trees were broken and graffiti left on buildings and signs during the `` mindless '' spree , which caused an estimated £ 3,000 worth of damage .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your views : remembering colin bloomfield
text: we 've had a few messages on facebook after mentioning today would have been colin bloomfield 's 35th birthday .
jonathan fletcher wrote : `` hope you 're having a great party up there col ! ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: point at millwall pleases spireites boss
text: chesterfield manager gary caldwell said he was delighted with the effort and commitment of his players in their 0-0 draw at millwall last night .
the result leaves the spireites six points from safety in league one .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : burton boxer is joshua 's sparring partner
text: frazer clarke took a break from his sheffield sparring sessions with anthony joshua to be interviewed by me at burton amateur boxing club .
i also shot this video of him displaying his strength and skill - i 'm glad he was hitting a punchbag and not me !
author: Alex Blakemore
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: closed pub could be flattened
text: plans to demolish a former derby pub and replace it with a new building featuring a shop and apartments have been submitted .
the late bar , in ford street , has been derelict for several years .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: scooter death crash teen named
text: police have named a 14-year-old boy who died in a crash in south normanton on sunday .
connor revill was killed when his push scooter and a car collided on fordbridge lane at about 20:00 .
a 27-year-old man arrested following the crash has been released on bail .
police have appealed for witnesses .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : tideswell sawyerheads
text: roy booth used your questions to ask us why people from tideswell had the nickname sawyerheads .

we spoke to the peak district national park authority , which told us the name is most commonly spelt `` saw y'eds '' and comes from an ancient tale of a local farmer who sawed the head off one of his cows ( not the one after it got stuck in a fence .
as the story goes , a doctor then came along , sewed the stricken animal 's head back on and it magically came back to life .
a nice tale but please do n't be tempted to try it yourself .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: huge response to cancer mum 's wedding appeal
text: a derby mum with incurable cancer has been offered a number of potential wedding venues following an appeal to businesses to help her marry the man she loves .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: your views : rams v burton
text: plenty of comments on bbc derby sport 's facebook page after the rams were held to a 0-0 draw by burton albion last night .
steven bull posted : `` major clearout needed ! !
a lot of deadwood !
need more fresh exciting players who can play without fear and play with freedom and entertain 31,000 plus fans on a tuesday night ! ! ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: windy weather warning
text: storm doris is on its way .
the met office has issued a yellow warning for wind in derby and derbyshire tomorrow from 06:00 to 20:00 .

it said : `` whilst the strongest winds look to be only short-lived , damage to structures , interruptions to power supplies and widespread disruption to travel networks are likely , with a danger of injury from flying debris .
`` trees are also likely to be damaged or blown over . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: remembering colin bloomfield
text: today would have been colin bloomfield 's 35th birthday .
the bbc radio derby presenter died from skin cancer in april 2015 .
happy birthday , bloomers .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a recap of our main stories so far :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: driver injures face in dry stone wall crash
text: this is chesterfield road in rowsley where the crash happened in the early hours of this morning .
it 's a long narrow road lined with houses , farm buildings and dry stone walls .
police have appealed for witnesses .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burton albion news conference
text: now it 's matt palmer 's turn to take questions from reporters .
he said the players were all pleased with taking four points from their previous two games and hoped to keep the run going against blackburn .
he also said he 's feeling fresh after being given a break by brewers boss nigel clough .
author: Ed Dawes
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: driver crashes through rural wall
text: a man suffered `` significant '' facial injuries in a crash in rowsley , police said .
the driver 's ford fiesta smashed through a dry stone wall and ended up in a field off chesterfield road at about 02:00 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burton albion news conference
text: fresh from last night 's 0-0 draw with derby , brewers boss nigel clough is taking questions from the media this morning .
he says friday 's home game against blackburn rovers could be soon for a return for injured trio brayford , mcfadzean and kightly .
author: Ed Dawes
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: your questions : tideswell 'sawyerheads '
text: roy booth got in touch through your questions to ask : why do they call inhabitants of tideswell sawyerheads ?
we do n't know roy but we 're going to attempt to find out .
if anyone can help , send me an email .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: park owners say it is 'not safe '
text: david and iris , who are in their 80s , said they were angry at the way they had been told to leave haytop country park in matlock .
iris said : `` it has shocked me that anybody could treat anyone like that , with a letter like that . ''
countrywide park homes , which owns the site , told the bbc it was no longer safe and residents had been given 28 days ' notice to leave .
they said the electrics and plumbing were `` considered dangerous '' and needed repairing .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: couple told to leave caravan park after 20 years
text: residents at this caravan park in matlock claim they have been told they need to leave immediately and take their holiday homes with them .
a couple from arnold have been using their static caravan at haytop country park for more than 20 years and are among 50 residents who have been told it 's closing .
the owners said they were closing the site to `` invest in improving the park to meet industry standards and local authority requirements '' .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: no goals as rams held by burton
text: the first ever meeting between derby county and burton albion at pride park did n't exactly produce a classic last night .
derby dominated possession but a gutsy performance from burton saw the match finish 0-0 .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: clarke backing joshua for the win
text: frazer clarke lost a fight to joshua in 2009 and he reckons former world heavyweight champion wladimir klitschko could suffer the same fate .
he said : `` the way he prepares , the talent he 's got , the ability he 's got , i 'm backing his youth , i 'm backing his speed and power to have klitschko out of there . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sparring with joshua a tough challenge
text: frazer clarke said he had known anthony joshua ( beating eric molina ) for more than a decade from their days on the amateur circuit and he was a special talent .
he said : `` i 've sparred with some boxers that are heavy handed - but if they 're a sledgehammer hitting you then joshua is a lump hammer hitting you twice as fast .
`` he 's not just hitting you hard , he 's explosive and very fast . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burton fighter prepares joshua for klitschko clash
text: a boxer from burton has been employed to help world heavyweight champion anthony joshua prepare for the biggest fight of his career .
frazer clarke ( has been sparring with joshua in sheffield ahead of his wembley bout with wladimir klitschko on 29 april .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : wednesday 's weather
text: fairly dry today but tomorrow we 've got storm doris arriving .
here 's my forecast
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hi everyone .
i hope you 're all feeling well on what looks like quite a pleasant morning .
i 'll be bringing you today 's news , sport , travel and weather updates for derbyshire and east staffordshire .
get in touch at any point by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live
